类 User

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.constants.User
public class User extends Object
Represents a user with their settings, game data, and score information. Provides methods to load and save user data, as well as access scores and FC/AP (Full Combo/All Perfect) statistics.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    boolean
    FCAPHintEnabled
    Flag indicating whether FCAP (Full Combo/All Perfect) hint is enabled.
    boolean
    handHintEnabled
    Flag indicating whether hints for left and right hand is enabled.
    boolean
    isAutoplay
    Flag indicating whether autoplay is enabled.
    boolean
    isValidUser
    Flag indicating whether the user is valid.
    int
    MUSIC_DIFFERENCE
    The music difference setting.
    boolean
    syncEnabled
    Flag indicating whether synchronization is enabled.
    int
    tolerance
    The tolerance setting for the user.
    HashMap<String,HashMap<String,HashMap<String,ScoreData>>>
    userData
    A map storing the user's game data, indexed by collection, song, and level.
    String
    userName
    The name of the user.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • User

      public User(File f)
      Constructor that initializes a User object by reading data from a file.
      参数:
      f - The file containing the user data.

    • User

      public User(String userName)
      Constructor to create a User object with the specified user name.
      参数:
      userName - The user's name.

      Default constructor that generates a random user name and initializes the user data.

  • 方法详细资料

    • exportUser

      public void exportUser()
      Exports the user's data to a file in the "Users" directory.

    • getScoreData

      public ScoreData getScoreData()
      Retrieves the score data for the current user, song, and level.
      返回:
      The score data for the current user, song, and level.

    • getFCAPData

      public Pair<Integer,Triple<Integer,Integer,Integer>> getFCAPData(String cd, String level)
      Retrieves FCAP (Full Combo/All Perfect) statistics for a given collection and level.
      参数:
      cd - The collection ID.
      level - The level ID (e.g., "LG").
      返回:
      A pair containing the total number of songs and a triple of FCAP statistics: new charts, full combos, and perfect scores.

    • getWholeGameFCAPData

      public Pair<Integer,Triple<Integer,Integer,Integer>> getWholeGameFCAPData(String level)
      Retrieves the FCAP (Full Combo/All Perfect) data for the entire game at a specific difficulty level. This method aggregates the FCAP data across all collections in the game.
      参数:
      level - The difficulty level to retrieve the FCAP data for (e.g., "BS", "MD", "AV", or "LG").
      返回:
      A Pair containing the total number of songs with FCAP data, and a Triple containing: - The count of songs with new charts, - The count of songs with a full combo (FC), - The count of songs with a perfect score (score equals 1000000).
